entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
